articles.description: More than four years since his last T20 for India, Ravichandran Ashwin has been included in the T20 World Cup squad while MS Dhoni will fill a 'mentor' role
articles.content:
India have picked off-spinner Ravichandran Ashwin in their 15-man squad for this year's T20 World Cup and named MS Dhoni, who led them to the 2007 title, as the team mentor.
Ashwin last played a T20… [+3220 chars]
